title: Asia Earthquake and Tsunami Fund
body: <p>I gave to <a href="https://secure.ga3.org/02/asia_earthquake04?source=aqt04_mo" title="Donate Now to Oxfam's Asia Earthquake Fund">Oxfam</a>. This earthquake probably couldn't have come at a worse time for donations either as most of us spent all of our money (and then some) during the holiday season. Thankfully they take credit. You can also donate through <a href="http://www.supportunicef.org/site/pp.asp?c=iuI1LdP0G&amp;b=45523" title="Make a Donation - Support Unicef">UNICEF</a>, the <a href="https://www.redcross.org/donate/donation-form.asp" title="American Red Cross - Online Donation Form">Red Cross</a>, or <a href="http://www.disastercenter.com/agency.htm" title="Disaster Relief Agencies and Nongovernment Organizations involved in Disaster Relief">other</a> <a href="http://pages.ebay.com/tsunamirelief/index.html" title="eBay: Tsunami Disaster Relief">agencies</a>.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-12-30

Asia Earthquake and Tsunami Fund

I gave to
